notesStmt.note: A reissue of "Sapientia clamitans, wisedome crying out to sinners to returne from their evill wayes", London, 1638, edited by William Milbourne, with cancel title page printed by M. Parsons; text printed by John Haviland.

"Of Christs fervent love to bloudy Jerusalem" and "Of Gods just hardning of Pharoah, when he had filled up the measure of his iniquity" are by Thomas Jackson, Dean of Peterborough; the latter has its own separately dated title page. "Of mans timely remembring of his creator" is by John Donne, and has its own separately dated title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
